ygData.subject: Crawl-report and seeds report are same for all jobs from the GUI when crawling
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all, It seems that in 1.4.0 	Crawl-report and seeds report are all same from the GUI when there is a craw job running. Regards.

Dear all,

It seems that in 1.4.0 	Crawl-report and seeds report are all same
from the GUI when there is a craw job running.

Regards.
